revision.comment: Created page with '{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_InquisitorCheckLand}} '''A_InquisitorCheckLand''' (no parameters) Decreases the calling actor's "reaction time" field by 1. If it reaches 0 or less, or one of â€¦'
revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_InquisitorCheckLand}} '''A_InquisitorCheckLand'''
(no parameters)
Decreases the calling actor's "reaction time" field by 1. If it reaches 0 or less, or one of the calling actor's horizontal velocities is 0, or the calling actor's altitude is on the floor or below, then the calling actor loses the NOGRAVITY flag, sees its "reaction time" set to 0, stops playing sounds in the ITEM channel, and is put in its See state.
Otherwise, continues looping the "inquisitor/jump" sound on the ITEM channel.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Inquisitor}} and derived classes.
[[Category:Decorate Strife functions]] [[category:Decorate Monster AI functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:InquisitorCheckLand}}
